long_description: The Mountainsmith Cubik camera case protects your compact point-and-shoot camera or other small digital devices from the hard knocks of your active outdoor adventures. Wide-opening clamshell is made of water-resistant, 500-denier nylon and molded, shock-absorbing EVA foam; zippered closure secures contents. Interior mesh pocket holds memory cards or other small accessories; soft lining helps protect your delicate device from scratches and abrasion. Detachable shoulder strap; belt loop. Internal dimensions: 5.25 x 2.875 x 1.25 in.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Cubik camera case protects your compact point-and-shoot camera or other small digital devices from the hard knocks of your active outdoor adventures.
